generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with tram tracks running down the center, flanked by parked cars and sidewalks.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are visible walking on the paved areas beside the road, separated by curbs.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, featuring storefronts and windows.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, providing shade and greenery.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Several individuals are present, including pedestrians on the sidewalks and near the parked vehicles.
- car: Numerous cars are parked along both sides of the street, including a white car directly ahead.
- truck: A large white truck with its back open is parked on the right side of the street.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the left side of the street, near the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign indicating "H" for a parking area is visible on the right side of the street.
